name: P Tou Go To The Party
name_original: P Tou Go To The Party
description:
Just have fun and dance together :)

Help P'Tou and P'Tou and P'Tou and P'Tou
go to his friend house and enjoy the party!

Game Control

For PC
Press up arrow to hands up and dance!
Press down arrow to dance on the floor!

For Mobile: play here
Just scroll up and down! up and down!
